nodes.text: Mari was a female daughter of a Mandalorian named Galron living during the Galactic War. She lived with her twin sister Tayn and their parents on the moon of Concordia, where their father and mother raised and trained them to become Mandalorians. One day, Galron took the girls out to hunt on the plains, after which they sey out a camp for the night. Before nighttime, Galron told his daughters the stories about Shae Vizla and Mandalore the Conqueror.
